description: Dewathaapedigedara Nishanthi Ranasinghe Vs. Hon. Attorney General & 1 Other before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: Dewathaapedigedara Nishanthi Ranasinghe Vs. Hon. Attorney General & 1 Other
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
keywords: Can an objection be taken by the Respondent to an application made to Court by the competent authority that the Respondent is not the Competent Authority or the land is not State Land within the meaning of the State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 of 1979.
legistation: State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 1979 (as amended)-Sections 3, 4, 5(1), 6, 7, 8, 9(1) and 9(2) and 10.
